project.description:
Yocto Dunfell nxp3220 weekly build
매주 일 s5p6818 weekly build 실행 후 trigger됨

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "***************************************" echo " Jenkins - Yocto environment setup " echo "***************************************"
#export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 #export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 #export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
repo sync
echo "***************************************" echo " Jenkins - clean build directory " echo "***************************************" rm -rf build/
echo "*****************************************" echo " Yocto Dunfell daudio2 tiny (nxp3220) " echo "*****************************************" source envsetup.sh nxp3220-daudio2 nexell-image-tiny bitbake nexell-image-tiny
echo "*****************************************" echo " Yocto Dunfell daudio2 tiny SDK (nxp3220) " echo "*****************************************" bitbake nexell-image-tiny -c populate_sdk

#!/bin/bash
cd out
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-*-tiny*-weekly.tar.gz rm -rf result-*-tiny*-weekly
echo "************************************" echo " BUILD-INFO.txt copy to result dir " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny/
echo "************************************" echo " Compress result dirs " echo "************************************" tar cvzf result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny.tar.gz result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny/*
echo "************************************" echo " Rename tarballs " echo "************************************" mv result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny.tar.gz result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny-dunfell-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Rename result dirs " echo "************************************" mv result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny result-nxp3220-daudio2-nexell-image-tiny-dunfell-`date +%Y%m%d`-weekly
